description: Shows a breakdown of expenses over time.

targets.queryText: SELECT SUM(t.value_usd) AS total_revenue FROM general_ledger t JOIN txgroup_hierarchy gh USING (txgroup_id) inner join txgroups g USING (txgroup_id) WHERE gh.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue', 'Expenses', 'Other Expense') AND t.timestamp >= $__from/1000 AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000 AND g.name IN (${Txgroup:sqlstring})
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT SUM(t.value_usd) AS total_revenue FROM general_ledger t JOIN txgroup_hierarchy gh USING (txgroup_id) inner join txgroups g USING (txgroup_id) WHERE gh.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue', 'Expenses', 'Other Expense') AND t.timestamp >= $__from/1000 AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000 AND g.name IN (${Txgroup:sqlstring})

targets.queryText: SELECT SUM(t.value_usd) / ((($__to - $__from) / 1000.0 / 60 / 60 / 24 / 30.436875)) AS total_revenue FROM general_ledger t JOIN txgroup_hierarchy gh USING (txgroup_id) inner join txgroups g USING (txgroup_id) WHERE gh.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue', 'Expenses', 'Other Expense') AND t.timestamp >= $__from/1000 AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000 AND g.name IN (${Txgroup:sqlstring})
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT SUM(t.value_usd) / ((($__to - $__from) / 1000.0 / 60 / 60 / 24 / 30.436875)) AS total_revenue FROM general_ledger t JOIN txgroup_hierarchy gh USING (txgroup_id) inner join txgroups g USING (txgroup_id) WHERE gh.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue', 'Expenses', 'Other Expense') AND t.timestamp >= $__from/1000 AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000 AND g.name IN (${Txgroup:sqlstring})

targets.queryText: SELECT SUM(t.value_usd) / ((($__to - $__from) / 1000.0 / 60 / 60 / 24 / 7)) AS total_revenue FROM general_ledger t JOIN txgroup_hierarchy gh USING (txgroup_id) inner join txgroups g USING (txgroup_id) WHERE gh.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue', 'Expenses', 'Other Expense') AND t.timestamp >= $__from/1000 AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000 AND g.name IN (${Txgroup:sqlstring})
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT SUM(t.value_usd) / ((($__to - $__from) / 1000.0 / 60 / 60 / 24 / 7)) AS total_revenue FROM general_ledger t JOIN txgroup_hierarchy gh USING (txgroup_id) inner join txgroups g USING (txgroup_id) WHERE gh.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue', 'Expenses', 'Other Expense') AND t.timestamp >= $__from/1000 AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000 AND g.name IN (${Txgroup:sqlstring})

targets.queryText: SELECT SUM(t.value_usd) / ((($__to - $__from) / 1000.0 / 60 / 60 / 24)) AS total_revenue FROM general_ledger t JOIN txgroup_hierarchy gh USING (txgroup_id) inner join txgroups g USING (txgroup_id) WHERE gh.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue', 'Expenses', 'Other Expense') AND t.timestamp >= $__from/1000 AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000 AND g.name IN (${Txgroup:sqlstring})
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT SUM(t.value_usd) / ((($__to - $__from) / 1000.0 / 60 / 60 / 24)) AS total_revenue FROM general_ledger t JOIN txgroup_hierarchy gh USING (txgroup_id) inner join txgroups g USING (txgroup_id) WHERE gh.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue', 'Expenses', 'Other Expense') AND t.timestamp >= $__from/1000 AND t.timestamp <= $__to/1000 AND g.name IN (${Txgroup:sqlstring})

targets.queryText:
SELECT t1.timestamp, g1.name AS "TxGroup", 
  SUM(CASE WHEN gh1.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue', 'Expenses', 'Other Expense') THEN t1.value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Expenses",
  (
    SELECT SUM(t2.value_usd) / 30.436875
    FROM general_ledger t2
    JOIN txgroup_hierarchy gh2 ON t2.txgroup_id = gh2.txgroup_id
    INNER JOIN txgroups g2 USING (txgroup_id)
    WHERE gh2.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue', 'Expenses', 'Other Expense')
      AND g2.name IN (${Txgroup:sqlstring})
      AND t2.timestamp <= t1.timestamp
      AND t2.timestamp > t1.timestamp - (30.436875 * 86400)
  ) AS "Monthly Avg"
FROM general_ledger t1
JOIN txgroup_hierarchy gh1 ON t1.txgroup_id = gh1.txgroup_id
INNER JOIN txgroups g1 USING (txgroup_id)
WHERE t1.timestamp >= $__from/1000 AND t1.timestamp <= $__to/1000 AND g1.name IN (${Txgroup:sqlstring})
GROUP BY t1.timestamp
ORDER BY t1.timestamp;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT t1.timestamp, g1.name AS "TxGroup", 
  SUM(CASE WHEN gh1.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue', 'Expenses', 'Other Expense') THEN t1.value_usd ELSE 0 END) AS "Expenses",
  (
    SELECT SUM(t2.value_usd) / 30.436875
    FROM general_ledger t2
    JOIN txgroup_hierarchy gh2 ON t2.txgroup_id = gh2.txgroup_id
    INNER JOIN txgroups g2 USING (txgroup_id)
    WHERE gh2.top_category in ('Cost of Revenue', 'Expenses', 'Other Expense')
      AND g2.name IN (${Txgroup:sqlstring})
      AND t2.timestamp <= t1.timestamp
      AND t2.timestamp > t1.timestamp - (30.436875 * 86400)
  ) AS "Monthly Avg"
FROM general_ledger t1
JOIN txgroup_hierarchy gh1 ON t1.txgroup_id = gh1.txgroup_id
INNER JOIN txgroups g1 USING (txgroup_id)
WHERE t1.timestamp >= $__from/1000 AND t1.timestamp <= $__to/1000 AND g1.name IN (${Txgroup:sqlstring})
GROUP BY t1.timestamp
ORDER BY t1.timestamp;

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT t.name FROM treasury_txs a INNER JOIN txgroup_hierarchy gh ON a.txgroup_id = gh.txgroup_id LEFT JOIN txgroups t ON gh.txgroup_id = t.txgroup_id WHERE (gh.top_category = 'Expenses' OR gh.top_category = 'Cost of Revenue' OR gh.top_category = 'Other Expense') AND a.timestamp >= $__from/1000 AND a.timestamp <= $__to/1000;
list.label: Tx Group
list.name: Txgroup
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT t.name FROM treasury_txs a INNER JOIN txgroup_hierarchy gh ON a.txgroup_id = gh.txgroup_id LEFT JOIN txgroups t ON gh.txgroup_id = t.txgroup_id WHERE (gh.top_category = 'Expenses' OR gh.top_category = 'Cost of Revenue' OR gh.top_category = 'Other Expense') AND a.timestamp >= $__from/1000 AND a.timestamp <= $__to/1000;

title: Expenses Over Time
